item.title: Precision Drilling Corporation 2016 Fourth Quarter and End of Year Results Conference Call and Webcast
item.description: [Marketwired] - Precision Drilling Corporation intends to release its 2016 fourth quarter results before the market opens on Thursday, February 9, 2017 and has scheduled a conference call and webcast to begin promptly ...
